description:
Specify hover color of notification buttons.


BUG=223774


Committed: https://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=192002

messages.text:
LGTM with 2 nits that you should deal with as you see fit.

https://codereview.chromium.org/13472017/diff/2001/ui/message_center/views/notification_view.cc
File ui/message_center/views/notification_view.cc (right):

https://codereview.chromium.org/13472017/diff/2001/ui/message_center/views/notification_view.cc#newcode57
ui/message_center/views/notification_view.cc:57: SkColorSetRGB(243, 243, 243);
Nit: "Notification" is redundant in this file, and "button hover background color" would work better if it spelled out a grammatically correct phrase, so something like kHoveredButtonBackgroundColor would be more readable (at least to me :-).

https://codereview.chromium.org/13472017/diff/2001/ui/message_center/views/notification_view.cc#newcode313
ui/message_center/views/notification_view.cc:313: kNotificationButtonHoverBackgroundColor));
Nit: You could use MakeBackground (a static function defined earlier in the file) to make this a bit shorter.

https://codereview.chromium.org/13472017/diff/2001/ui/message_center/views/notification_view.cc
File ui/message_center/views/notification_view.cc (right):

https://codereview.chromium.org/13472017/diff/2001/ui/message_center/views/notification_view.cc#newcode57
ui/message_center/views/notification_view.cc:57: SkColorSetRGB(243, 243, 243);
On 2013/04/02 22:45:28, dharcourt wrote:
> Nit: "Notification" is redundant in this file, and "button hover background
> color" would work better if it spelled out a grammatically correct phrase, so
> something like kHoveredButtonBackgroundColor would be more readable (at least to
> me :-).

Done.

https://codereview.chromium.org/13472017/diff/2001/ui/message_center/views/notification_view.cc#newcode313
ui/message_center/views/notification_view.cc:313: kNotificationButtonHoverBackgroundColor));
On 2013/04/02 22:45:28, dharcourt wrote:
> Nit: You could use MakeBackground (a static function defined earlier in the
> file) to make this a bit shorter.

Done.

CQ is trying da patch. Follow status at
https://chromium-status.appspot.com/cq/mukai@chromium.org/13472017/5002

subject: Specify hover color of notification buttons.
